item.title: Most talked about shows for April 2014
item.dc:creator: Ralph Regalado
item.description: Which shows we talked about in Twitter last April 2014? This infographic shows you the TV shows/series, concerts, movies and YouTube video prominent in the social media last month. Were you able to catch any of them?
item.content:encoded: Which shows we talked about in Twitter last April 2014? This infographic shows you the TV shows/series, concerts, movies and YouTube video prominent in the social media last month. Were you able to catch any of them?

item.title: Pinoy Summer 2014
item.dc:creator: Ralph Regalado
item.description: It’s the middle of summer! What do we talk about as far as summer is concerned? Taken from Twitter posts last March 2014, just at the beginning of summer, the infographic shows that we talk about the places we wish or plan to go, people want to spend it with, activities we want to do, […]
item.content:encoded: It’s the middle of summer! What do we talk about as far as summer is concerned? Taken from Twitter posts last March 2014, just at the beginning of summer, the infographic shows that we talk about the places we wish or plan to go, people want to spend it with, activities we want to do, and our feelings about it. Regardless of where, what and who, let’s make the most of this summer!
